main event: A witness observed a large, elongated light gray object hovering in the sky over Daly City, California, on 7/7/68.
interesting points: The object moved slowly at first and then suddenly accelerated out of sight to the west,The observation lasted approximately 3 minutes,The sky was clear overhead but there was some haze over the coast,The witness has a background in stargazing and had taken a course in astronomy,The report is part of the historical Project Blue Book investigations conducted by the U.S. Air Force.
sighted object: a large elongated light gray object
witness description: a male, age 23, with experience in stargazing and astronomy
